e2eResults.note: E2E tests require the app to be running. Make sure to run "npm run dev" first, or tests will run automatically via Playwright webServer config.

strengths: The code is well-structured and follows a clear directory hierarchy.
The use of TypeScript and Next.js App Router is well-implemented.
The code includes clear and concise comments for future reference.
improvements: The TODO comment in Home.tsx should be removed once the implementation is complete.
The About page could benefit from a more descriptive title and metadata.
Consider adding a loading indicator or a placeholder for the ChallengeList component to improve the user experience.
aiReviewResults.overall: The code is well-structured and demonstrates a good understanding of Next.js App Router and TypeScript. With a few minor improvements, it has the potential to be a high-quality and maintainable codebase.
